19.title: Yarrrrrgh!
19.description: Happy International Talk Like a Pirate Day!

20.title: 13 years ago today...
20.description: The United States Military ended the "don't ask, don't tell" policy, allowing openly gay people to serve.

24.title: 67 years ago today...
24.description: The 101st Airborne Division was sent to Little Rock, Arkansas to enforce racial integration at Central High School.

25.title: 334 years ago today...
25.description: "Publick Occurrences Both Forreign and Domestick", the first American newspaper, was published for the first and only time.

26.title: 64 years ago today...
26.description: The first televised Presidential Debate occurred between Richard Nixon and John F. Kennedy.

29.title: 797 years ago today...
29.description: Holy Roman Emperor Frederick II was excommunicated by Pope Gregory IX for his failure to participate in the Crusades.

2.title: Happy Birthday Mahatma Gandhi!
2.description: Gandhi was born on this day in 1869!

3.title:
Mean Girls Day
(wear pink!)
3.description: On October 3rd, he asked me what day it was!

4.title: World Space Week!
4.description: 67 years ago today, Sputnik 1 was launched!

5.title: 30 years ago today...!
5.description: The bodies of 48 members of The Order of the Solar Temple were found after a cult mass-murder suicide.

6.title: World Space Week!
6.description: 34 years ago today, Space Shuttle Discovery launched the Ulysses probe to chart the Sun!

7.title: World Space Week!
7.description: 65 years ago today, [Luna 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luna_3) transmitted the first photos of the far side of the moon!

9.title: World Space Week!
9.description: 15 years ago today, NASA's [Lunar Precursor Robotic Program](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lunar_Precursor_Robotic_Program) impacted the moon to record data for future crewed missions!

10.title: Last day of Space Week :‍(
10.description: 57 years ago today, the [Outer Space Treaty](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Outer_Space_Treaty) was established!

11.title: Space Week is Forever!
11.description:
66 years ago today, NASA launched its first space probe, [Pioneer1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pioneer_1)!

56 years ago today, [Apollo 7](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apollo_7) was launched!

50 years ago today, [Kathryn D. Sullivan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kathryn_D._Sullivan) became the first American woman to perform a space walk!

24 years ago today, the [100th Space Shuttle mission](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/STS-92) was launched!

12.title: 123 years ago today...
12.description: Theodore Roosevelt [officially renamed](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White_House#Naming_conventions) the Executive Mansion to the White House!

13.title: 232 years ago today...
13.description: The cornerstone of the White House was laid!

18.title: 61 years ago today...
18.description: [F√©licette](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/F%C3%A9licette) becomes the first cat in space!

21.title: 41 years ago today...
21.description: The [metre was redefined](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metre#Speed_of_light_definition) as the distance light travels in a vacuum in 1/299,792,458 seconds.

22.title: 145 years ago today...
22.description: Edison tested the first practical [incandescent bulb](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Incandescent_light_bulb), which lasted thirteen and a half hours!

23.title: 6,028 years ago today...
23.description: The world was created... according to [James Ussher](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Ussher).

24.title: 123 years ago today...
24.description: [Annie Edson Taylor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Annie_Edson_Taylor) became the first person to go over Niagara Falls in a barrel!

28.title: 102 years ago today...
28.description: Fascists took over the Italian government in the [March on Rome](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/March_on_Rome).

29.title: 55 years ago today...
29.description: The first computers connected over the [ARPANET](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ARPANET), an early version of the Internet

2.title: As of today...
2.description: The [International Space Station](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Space_Station) has been continuously occupied for 24 years!

4.title: 64 years ago today...
4.description: [Jane Goodall](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jane_Goodall) became the first to observe non-human animals create tools!

5.title: 419 years ago today...
5.description: [Guy Fawkes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guy_Fawkes) was arrested, foiling the [Gunpowder Plot of 1605](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gunpowder_Plot).

6.title: 12 years ago today...
6.description: The first openly gay Senator, [Tammy Baldwin](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tammy_Baldwin), was elected!

7.title: 30 years ago today...
7.description: [WXYC](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WXYC) began the first Internet radio broadcast!

17.title: 130 years ago today...
17.description: [H. H. Holmes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/H._H._Holmes), one of the first modern serial killers, was arrested.

18.title: 39 years ago today...
18.description: The [first Calvin and Hobbes strip](https://www.gocomics.com/calvinandhobbes/1985/11/18) was published!

6.title: 107 years ago today...
6.description: The [Halifax Explosion](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halifax_Explosion), the largest non-nuclear explosion in history, killed 1,800.

24.title: 2 years ago today...
24.description: A Canadian judge [ruled](https://citoyens.soquij.qc.ca/php/decision.php?ID=B40649560046AC98B6BC3AA9D9C409F7) that raising the middle finger is a  'God-given, Charter enshrined right that belongs to every red-blooded Canadian'.

4.title: 215 years ago today...
4.description: [The Society in Dedham for Apprehending Horse Thieves](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Society_in_Dedham_for_Apprehending_Horse_Thieves) met for the first time!
